titleStmt.title: The scourge of drunkennes. By William Hornby Gent
titleStmt.author: Hornby, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Thomas Baylie, and are to be solde at his shop, in the Middle-Row in Holborne, neere vnto Staple-Inne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The scourge of drunkennesse.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, in the Middle-Row in Holborne, neere vnto Staple-Inne
